alert.note: Alert for Pike; Walthall (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 1:58PM CDT until June 10 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern St. Helena Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Northern Tangipahoa Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Washington Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Southern Walthall County in southern Mississippi... Southeastern Pike County in southern Mississippi... * Until 300 PM CDT. * At 158 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Dexter to near Kentwood, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bogalusa, Franklinton, Greensburg, Amite, Amite City, Kentwood, Tylertown, Varnado, Roseland, Enon, Mount Herman, Wilmer, Dexter, Tangipahoa and Angie. This includes Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 47 and 61. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
